body_html:
The function def call() is the main part implemetation of paper:https://arxiv.org/pdf/1506.04214v1.pdf. But a problem now confused me is that in the main part implementation w_ci dot C_t-1 has disappeared while it appears in paper formula (3). Why?

The full implementation of ConvLSTM at here
body_text:
The function def call() is the main part implemetation of paper:https://arxiv.org/pdf/1506.04214v1.pdf. But a problem now confused me is that in the main part implementation w_ci dot C_t-1 has disappeared while it appears in paper formula (3).  Why?
The full implementation of ConvLSTM at here
body:
The function `def call()` is the main part implemetation of paper:https://arxiv.org/pdf/1506.04214v1.pdf. But a problem now confused me is that in the main part implementation `w_ci dot C_t-1` has disappeared while it appears in paper formula (3).  Why?

The full implementation of ConvLSTM at [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.12/tensorflow/contrib/rnn/python/ops/rnn_cell.py#L2046)
